drshaddix@shaddixplasticsurgery.com]]></text></topic><topic position="494,80" order="2" id="3"><text><![CDATA[At Shaddix Plastic Surgery, our entire team wants to assist you reach your aesthetic goals. 
While you have lots of options of plastic surgeons in Pensacola, we hope you will certainly provide us 
the opportunity to reveal you how we are different. We recognize that each person has one-of-a-kind 
concerns concerning their appearance. We take the time to understand these concerns in order to craft 
a personalized treatment strategy. We always keep a pressure-free environment and recognize that the 
decision to pursue cosmetic surgery is significant. At your consultation, our objective is to educate you 
about the options available so that you can understand each of them and make the decision that suits 
you finest. Likewise, this website has been designed with you in mind. The site offers us an additional method 
to supply info that will certainly allow you to make even more informed selections. We genuinely hope that you 
will discover extra about our practice, the many cosmetic improvement procedures and treatments available to you, 
and various other useful info that will certainly answer questions you may have about plastic surgery. Dr. Shaddix is 
board licensed in plastic surgery and has spent years training to be able to provide beautiful and natural results in a 
safe and affordable fashion. He would love the opportunity to meet you. If you are considering a facelift, liposuction, 
breast augmentation, or merely Botox or another non-surgical treatment in Pensacola and along Florida's Gulf Coast, 
please give us a call. We look forward to hearing from you.
]]></text></topic></topic></map>
